summary: This document is an email from TD Ameritrade confirming the attachment of forms requested by a client. It includes instructions for completing and returning the forms, as well as contact information for further assistance. The email emphasizes the importance of privacy and provides details about account opening requirements.

persons.name: Tom Bradley
persons.context: Tom Bradley is mentioned as the sender of the email, representing TD Ameritrade.

keyFacts: The email confirms the attachment of various forms requested by a client.
Instructions are provided for completing and returning the forms to TD Ameritrade.
Tom Bradley is identified as the President of Retail Distribution at TD Ameritrade.
The document emphasizes the importance of privacy regarding client accounts.
Specific addresses for standard and overnight delivery to TD Ameritrade are provided.
